input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Brevet Lightweight Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Lightweight Long Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Brevet Long Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Trek Men's Rapha Core Cycling Shirt'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Trail Technical T-Shirt'
  - Name='Rapha Women's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Bagarre Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='ASSOS Equipe R Spring Fall Jersey S11 Black'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Pisa Limited Edition Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Men's Equipe R S11 Surface Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Sezione Cycling Jersey 2023'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Aero Race 8S Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Men's Spring Fall P1 Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='CASTELLI Women's Tropicale Long-Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Jersey C2 EVO'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Orizzonte Limited Edition Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Simbolo Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Espresso Jersey Men's Long Sleeve'
  - Name='Castelli Premio Evo Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Men's Mille GT Drophead C2 Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Giro 105 Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='ASSOS Equipe Rs Jersey S11'
  - Name='Castelli Unlimited Allroad Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar cycling jersey likely made with performance and durability in mind, suitable for similar use as the reference Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Brevet Lightweight Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight cycling jersey with short sleeves, suitable for similar riding needs though possibly less focus on compression or moisture-wicking than Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Lightweight Long Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve variant but still a lightweight cycling jersey serving similar function and likely similar materials and technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aerodynamic cycling jersey designed for performance, very similar in function and construction to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Brevet Long Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey from Rapha focusing on brevet style; likely similar fabric but potentially less compression and different fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Trek Men's Rapha Core Cycling Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the same or closely related product to the reference Core Jersey, likely identical in purpose, features, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Trail Technical T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical shirt for trail use likely less tailored cycling jersey design and possibly different fit and pocket configuration.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Women's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Equivalent core jersey designed for women; similar fabric, construction, and features for cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Bagarre Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey built for performance, similar use and features though brand and possibly materials differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Equipe R Spring Fall Jersey S11 Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Seasonal cycling jersey intended for spring/fall; likely similar fabric quality and silhouette but focused on slightly different conditions.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Pisa Limited Edition Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal jersey indicates heavier fabric for warmth, making it less directly comparable to lightweight Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Equipe R S11 Surface Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey similar in function and design to Core Jersey, suitable for similar cycling activities.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Sezione Cycling Jersey 2023
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Modern cycling jersey designed for performance use, likely similar features and function to Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Aero Race 8S Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aerodynamic short sleeve cycling jersey with close fit, very similar in function, silhouette, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Spring Fall P1 Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer rather than outer jersey; different product type with different purpose and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Women's Tropicale Long-Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey for women, similar purpose but different silhouette and possible materials due to sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT Jersey C2 EVO
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality cycling jersey with performance features similar to Core Jersey, intended for similar cycling use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Orizzonte Limited Edition Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey with comparable features, suitable for route and training rides akin to Core Jersey's use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Simbolo Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A performance cycling jersey with characteristics likely aligning closely with the Core Jersey's function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey, similar in good quality but less aligned with the lightweight short sleeve Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Premio Evo Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end, lightweight cycling jersey engineered for performance, very similar in construction and purpose to Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Mille GT Drophead C2 Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical cycling jersey similar in fit and fabric, designed for performance rides like the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Giro 105 Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey aimed at serious riders, comparable to Core Jersey in silhouette and features.
